outputs.output_descr: This project seeks to enhance capacities of policy and decision makers to formulate pro-poor and development-oriented policies using updated poverty data.  This will support the Philippine government in formulating an enhanced MDG-based poverty reduction strategy program for 2005 to 2010 that focuses on operational mechanisms of reducing poverty incidence from 34% to 17%, in line with MDG 1 and the Medium Term Philippine Development Plan 2004-2010 targets.  This will also support efforts directed towards strengthening partnerships among key poverty reduction stakeholders.

This project is designed to support the establishment and institutionalization of an integrated, localized, MDG and rights-based poverty monitoring and mapping systems.  This also seeks to ensure that poverty data and maps are updated regularly and povertry monitoring systems are functioning.  Development and regular updating of MDG Progress Report is one of the key outputs.

project_descr: AChieving the Millenium Development Goals and Reducing Human Poverty
project_title: Achieving the MDGs and Reducing Human Poverty
